data.name: Motivating and managing remote teams
data.summary:
Will discuss how to motivate and manage remote sales teams. Throughout the session we will cover methods to engage your salespeople and keep motivations high.

In our upcoming webinar, Nick Washington-Jones, Managing Director Tack TMI, experts in Sales Enablement training, covers methods to engage your salespeople and keep motivations high so your team continue to drive your business forward during these challenging times.
data.speakers: Nick Washington-Jones, Managing Director, Tack TMI UK
